title: Tokyo Longing: A Host Club Romance
description: A Woman Hunting For PassionAmerican girl Allison has been waiting for love to appear ever since she moved to Tokyo for a job as a teacher, but she is still dreaming of the one man who will take her by storm.One night she takes love into her own hands and seeks him out in the exotic nightlife in Tokyo at a Host Club, but finds herself entranced by not only one man, but two of them! Allison is torn between her two erotic affairs, and slowly realizes a delicious secret that both of the men are reluctant to tell. This title contains erotic content, and is intended for readers aged 18 and over.
author: Marina Lovechild
